So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, select a study design, and find a sample to study.
\textbf{In this chapter}, you will learn how to ensure that the conclusions are logical and sound.
You will learn to:

\begin{itemize}\tightlist
  \item
  identify issues that might negatively impact internal validity.
  \item
  identify issues that might impact the values of the response variables.
  \item
  identify extraneous, confounding and lurking variables.
\end{itemize}
\end{objectivesBox}
